mapper.update:
UPDATE
#mset()
#if($_parameter.jgid) JGID = @{_parameter.jgid,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#end #if($_parameter.detectStation) DETECT_STATION = @{_parameter.detectStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#end #if($_parameter.overloadStatus) OVERLOAD_STATUS = @{_parameter.overloadStatus,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#end #if($_parameter.reportTimes) REPORT_TIMES = @{_parameter.reportTimes,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#end #if($_parameter.beginTime) BEGIN_TIME = @{_parameter.beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#end #if($_parameter.endTime) END_TIME = @{_parameter.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#end #if($_parameter.tjDate) TJ_DATE = @{_parameter.tjDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#end #if($_parameter.updateTime) UPDATE_TIME = @{_parameter.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#end
#end WHERE ID = @{_parameter.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql:
SELECT DETECT_STATION, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '00:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as ah, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '01:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as bh, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '02:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as ch, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '03:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as dh, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '04:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as eh, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '05:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as fh, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '06:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as gh, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '07:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as hh, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '08:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as ih, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '09:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as jh, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '10:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as kh, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '11:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as lh, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '12:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as mh, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '13:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as nh, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '14:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as oh, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '15:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as ph, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '16:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as qh, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '17:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as rh, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '18:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as sh, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '19:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as th, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '20:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as uh, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '21:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as vh, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '22:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as wh, SUM(decode(to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'), '23:00:00', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as xh FROM
GROUP BY DETECT_STATION ORDER BY DETECT_STATION

#where() #if($_parameter.detectStation && $_parameter.detectStation != '') AND DETECT_STATION = @{_parameter.detectStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #end #if($_parameter.jgid && $_parameter.jgid != '') AND JGID = @{_parameter.jgid,jdbcType=NUMERIC} #end #if($_parameter.tjDate && $_parameter.tjDate != '') AND BEGIN_TIME >= @{_parameter.tjDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} #end #if($_parameter.updateTime && $_parameter.updateTime != '') AND BEGIN_TIME <= @{_parameter.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} #end AND OVERLOAD_STATUS !=0 #end
mapper.select:
SELECT to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss'ï¼‰as HDTIME, SUM(decode(DETECT_STATION, '1', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as A, SUM(decode(DETECT_STATION, '2', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as B, SUM(decode(DETECT_STATION, '3', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as C, SUM(decode(DETECT_STATION, '4', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as D, SUM(decode(DETECT_STATION, '5', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as E FROM
GROUP BY to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss') ORDER BY to_char(BEGIN_TIME,'HH24:mi:ss')
mapper.sql: #where() #if($_parameter.condition.detectStation && $_parameter.condition.detectStation != '') AND DETECT_STATION = @{_parameter.condition.detectStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #end #if($_parameter.condition.jgid && $_parameter.condition.jgid != '') AND JGID = @{_parameter.condition.jgid,jdbcType=NUMERIC} #end #if($_parameter.condition.tjDate && $_parameter.condition.tjDate != '') AND BEGIN_TIME >= @{_parameter.condition.tjDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} #end #if($_parameter.condition.updateTime && $_parameter.condition.updateTime != '') AND BEGIN_TIME <= @{_parameter.condition.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} #end AND OVERLOAD_STATUS !=0 #end
mapper.select:
SELECT TO_CHAR(TJ_DATE, 'dd') as HDTIME, SUM(decode(DETECT_STATION, '1', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as A, SUM(decode(DETECT_STATION, '2', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as B, SUM(decode(DETECT_STATION, '3', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as C, SUM(decode(DETECT_STATION, '4', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as D, SUM(decode(DETECT_STATION, '5', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as E FROM
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TJ_DATE, 'dd') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(TJ_DATE, 'dd')
mapper.sql:
SELECT DETECT_STATION, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '01', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as aday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '02', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as bday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '03', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as cday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '04', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as dday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '05', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as eday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '06', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as fday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '07', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as gday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '08', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as hday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '09', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as iday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '10', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as jday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '11', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as kday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '12', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as lday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '13', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as mday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '14', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as nday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '15', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as oday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '16', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as pday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '17', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as qday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '18', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as rday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '19', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as sday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '20', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as tday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '21', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as uday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '22', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as vday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '23', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as wday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '24', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as xday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '25', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as yday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '26', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as zday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '27', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as aaday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '28', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as abday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '29', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as acday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '30', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as aeday, SUM(decode(to_char(TJ_DATE,'dd'), '31', REPORT_TIMES,null)) as afday FROM
GROUP BY DETECT_STATION ORDER BY DETECT_STATION
